attributes.action: Ban the sale and use of "Glue Traps" immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Glue traps" are arguably the worst method of pest control in terms of animal suffering.  They are composed of pieces of wood/card/plastic with glue on one side which animals become stuck to, often struggling for up to five days before they die due to starvation or dehydration.  These animals become extremely distressed, and have been known to chew off their own limbs or rip the fur from their bodies in an attempt to escape.
The RSPCA are aginst the use of these devices against rodents "because of the suffering they cause".
This kind of cruelty is unacceptable and the law should reflect this.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban the sale and use of "Glue Traps" immediately."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18352


Prime Minister's Office
